author: USA TODAY, Andrea Mandell, USA TODAY
title: Pink says she tested positive for coronavirus and is now negative, pledges $1M to crisis
description: Pink says she tested positive for the coronavirus two weeks ago and has since beaten it. Now she's donating $1 million to healthcare professionals.
content:
Taylor Swift, Lady Gaga and Ariana Grande are telling people to stay home. Others like Lizzo and Lil Nas X are finding new ways to connect with fans.
USA TODAY
Pink says she tested positive for the coronavirus two weeks ago and has since beaten it.
